questionText: In the context of IOTA Object Display, what is the role of the `Publisher` object?

answerOptions.answerText: It acts as a storage mechanism for all IOTA objects.
It is used to verify the authenticity of transactions on the IOTA network.
It is necessary for creating new UIDs for objects.
It enables the on-chain management of off-chain representations for types.

questionText: What is the purpose of the `update_version` function in the IOTA Object Display standard?

answerOptions.answerText: To apply changes to a `Display` object and emit an event for full nodes to retrieve the updated template.
To permanently remove a `Display` object from the blockchain.
To duplicate the current version of a `Display` object for backup purposes.
To validate the integrity of the data stored in the `Display` object.
